comment: Love her!! I took her for ENGL 1101 and 1102. She's so sweet and understanding. As long as you put in effort you'll get a good grade. Makes assignments fun and encourages you to write about pop culture and topics you are actually interested in. She'll often release class early. Usually 3 papers (test grades) per semester and weekly assignments.

This is one of the most understanding teachers I've ever had. She understands that life happens, which is sometimes unheard of with professors. She grades based on 100, 50, or 0, so it's literally either you did the assignment, or you didn't. She also provides great feedback for the assignments if you ask her, which is great! She's also funny :)
Very good professor and very reasonable. Always was willing to help students and gave good feedback on essays and other homework assignments I  would definitely recommend this professor  to someone.
she is so chill and all of the assignments were about music and media that is relevant to today. i did many papers on kendrick lamar.

Entire class is centered around a research paper, on a topic of your choice. There is a lot of research involved in the class but it goes into the final paper. She is very sweet, and into pop culture. Loves talking about Jay Z and Beyonce. Classes will either be power points, or workshopping with peers. All writing done outside of class=lots of HW.

Sweetest lady ever. Gives weekly assignments with clear instructions that are all related to the final paper. Lectures once a week and is very good at talking so be prepared! Is not a hard grader as long as you follow instructions. Final exam is your paper so you don't go anywhere you just turn it in. Super hard to fail this class, she's great!

I took her 1102 class. This professor over explains a lot. If you know anything about creating a research paper, after the first few lectures I would recommend not even going to class, it's a waste of time. The course wasn't difficult unless you have never taken a research class.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Professor Rinn is great, and she is so nice. There are only 3 main papers. The homework assignments were fun and helpful to our main papers. The only reason I put so many papers is because some of the homework assignments were small writing assignments that helped with the main papers. Textbook is online and no tests or final exam.
Great class. Would recommend for english classes and for a professor who is just starting out she is GREAT.
This was such an easy class, but the workload was ALOT! The work was very easy though. She doesn't grade harshly at all!

If I could I would take Prof Rinn's class over and over again! She is the sweetest professor I've ever had and makes boring lectures fun! Her ppts are so cute (she often inserts pics of her cat Pepe). Her work was really easy and she gave extensions to anyone if needed. She's very flexible and I feel like its almost impossible to fail her class :)
Professor Norman is by far one of my favorite professors at KSU. Her assignments are easy to understand and she gives plenty of time to finish them. She is hilarious, #Pepethecat

Professor Norman is hands down the best professor at KSU. She is so sweet, her PPTs are aesthetically pleasing, and she is that "cool" professor. She knows how to teach, she doesn't grade harshly, and she gives a lot of time for assignment. She is available to talk out confusions and she cares for her students. Take her, you won't regret it at all

Professor Rinn is phenomenal for her 1st year of teaching, please take her. Her class consists of quizzes, in-class activities, participation, extra credit, readings, and 3 major papers. Attendance isn't mandatory, but you earn extra credit for showing up. She is willing to work with her students and truly wants to see everyone succeed.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: For her first year of teaching, she is pretty good at it. She is very flexible and will help you out within reason. Her lectures are interactive and easy to understand. The textbook is hardly used so I doubt you truly need to buy it.

Professor Rinn is awesome. Her assignments are simple and she never makes things more complicated than they need to be. She is good at preparing students for major assignments with lectures and PowerPoints. Attendance is taken but will not count against you if you don't show up. Extra credit offered on Major assignments and for your overall grade.

Professor Rinn is an amazing professor. She is very relatable and understanding and  makes lectures based on the issues she sees within her students' assignments for improvement. Attendance is not required for her class but she gives bonus points randomly during the week for attending and there are lots of in-class activities and participation.

PRofessor Rinn is awesome! She's young and cool. She's really honest with us about her own life and it's really relatable. She cares about getting everyone good grades and she's hilarious. We don't use the textbook a lot which annoying because it was expensive, but her lectures are usually good. Sometimes boring, but that's just english class.
